body: Add a cool down time when making forum posts to prevent spam.
body_tagged: Add a cool down time when making forum posts to prevent spam.
title: [SUG] Cool down time.

replies.body: There is apparently doesn't work well for some people.
replies.body_tagged: There is apparently doesn't work well for some people.

replies.body: There already is one, I believe, but it doesn't tell you how long you have to wait until its over.
replies.body_tagged: There already is one, I believe, but it doesn't tell you how long you have to wait until its over.

replies.body: It exists, and lasts for fifteen seconds.
